application.ref: A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

text.p: It was highlighted that the original article [1] contained only the initials of the authors' first names. This Correction article shows the full author names. The original article has been updated.It was highlighted that the original article [1] contained only the initials of the authors' first names. This Correction article shows the full author names.
